QuestData.Title: Into the Dragon's Mouth
QuestData.Description: <Dr. Blam stares at the egg in awed silence, blinks a few times, then looks up at you.>$b$bD... did you see that? Incredible! My titan thing idea worked! With your help, of course.$b$bWe'll want to get this back to Rhea. She's not at Lethlor Ravine anymore; it sounds like she blew her cover pretty well when she transformed into her true form in front of all those whelps. She's now in the west, staying at an Alliance camp called Dragon's Mouth.$b$bShe'll be waiting for you. And for that egg.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Purified Black Dragon Egg to Rhea at Dragon's Mouth in the Badlands.
QuestData.CompletionText: That's some precious cargo you carry there, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: I'll take that egg out of your hands now. We need to get this egg incubated... and hidden, quickly. There are lots of angry dragons looking for this.$b$bIt's good to see you again, by the way.
